entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:15 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 2:15 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 2:15 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
